explains: adj. （在某领域或职业中）卓越的，出众的；突出的，明显的
wordGroup: eminent domain [律]土地征用权；国家最高支配权

sentences.en: She invoked several eminent scholars to back up her argument.
sentences.cn: 她援引了几位赫赫有名的学者来支持她的论点。

sentences.en: It gives birth to many eminent scholars.
sentences.cn: 它孕育了许多杰出的学者。

sentences.en: Dickens was pre-eminent among English writers of his day.
sentences.cn: 狄更斯在其同时期英国作家中最为出色。
